items.title: The world of one denomination
items.summary:
After working in tech space for 2 years and starting my journey in the business world.
I was fascinated to fuse both ever-growing fields and came across the concept of one global currency.
What if the world operated on with the same currency worldwide?
World bank digitizing Ethereum based bond raising 110 million AUD is some of the greatest initiatives to promote this technology.
All of this paves our way to stable and safe de-centralized currency where we can send our money back home hassle-free.
